ssGUI
namespace
ssGUI
ssGUI::​CharacterRenderInfo
struct
ssGUI::​CharacterRenderInfo
Variables
Advance
float Advance

How many pixels this character takes horizontally

DrawOffset
glm::vec2 DrawOffset

Offset for getting the top-left corner of the character from the baseline.  In other words, this is the bearing but Y is flipped

Size
glm::vec2 Size

The character size corresponding to UVOrigin

BaselinePosition
glm::vec2 BaselinePosition

This is the character global position on the baseline.  To get the top-left corner of the character, add DrawOffset to this

CharacterAtNewline
bool CharacterAtNewline

True if this character is on a newline

Rendered
bool Rendered

When true, this means there's font assigned to this character and not space, tab, newline character or empty character.

Valid
bool Valid

When false, this means there's no font assigned to this character or is null character

LineMinY
float LineMinY

Minimum Y bound of the current line (Relative to BaselinePosition)

LineMaxY
float LineMaxY

Maximum Y bound of the current line (Relative to BaselinePosition)

RenderFontSize
float RenderFontSize

This is the actual font size that gets displayed, since it is possible that the requested font size is not available.

TargetSizeMultiplier
float TargetSizeMultiplier

The multiplier to be applied to Advance, Size and DrawOffset in order to render the character at the target size
